A_Questions:
Finish the sentence:
I don't know <u>[私のタブレットがどこにあるか]</u> (4)
A_Answers: I don't know where my tablet is.
C_Questions:
Unmix (並べ替えて):
Shigeru Miyamoto / is / named / there / a game creator.
C_Answers: There is a game creator named Shigeru Miyamoto.
D_Questions:
Finish the sentence:
This is an acorn [私は家の中で見つけた].
D_Answers: This is an acorn I found in my house.
E_Questions: Who is a character that you like?

A_Questions:
Unmix (並べ替えて):
time / I should / what / wake up / I know
A_Answers: I know what time I should wake up.
B_Questions: What is <u>something that makes you happy</u>?
C_Questions:
Finish the sentence:
Mario is a character <u>[宮本茂さんに作られた]</u>.
C_Answers: Mario is a character made by Shigeru Miyamoto.
D_Questions:
Unmix (並べ替えて):
my / met / sister / Totoro / the friend / is
D_Answers: Totoro is the friend my sister met.
E_Questions:
Unmix (並べ替えて):
can / a girl / Anya / who / read minds / is

A_Questions:
Fix:
Tell me when is our test.
B_Questions: Who is <u>a person that you respect</u>?
C_Questions:
Fix:
Mushrooms and stars are things use by Mario.
C_Answers: Mushrooms and stars are things **used** by Mario.
D_Questions:
Fix:
The I heard music was a flute.
D_Answers: The **music I heard** was a flute.
E_Questions:
Fix:
All Might is a always smiling hero.

A_Questions:
Finish the sentence:
Please teach me <u>[ピザの作り方]</u> (4)
A_Answers: Please teach me how to make pizza.
B_Questions: What is the restaurant that you like the most?
C_Questions:
Unmix (並べ替えて):
wearing / the man / green / Luigi / clothes / is .
C_Answers: The man wearing green clothes is Luigi.
D_Questions: Totoro took <u>[お父さんのために持ってきた傘]</u>. (7-8)
D_Answers: Totoro took the umbrella I brought for my father.
E_Questions:
Make a sentence:
Anpanman is a ______ who _____.

A_Questions: Can + show me + where + nearest restaurant = ???
A_Answers: Can you show me where the nearest restaurant is?
B_Questions: How can we help each other in a disaster?
C_Questions: <u>[マリオと戦っているゴリラは]</u> Donkey Kong.
C_Answers: The gorilla fighting Mario is Donkey Kong.
D_Questions:
I rode this catbus with my sister.
=> This is...
D_Answers: This is the catbus I rode with my sister.
E_Questions:
Finish the sentence:
Medalist is <u>[見たことがないアニメ]</u>. (6-7)

A_Questions:
Say in English:
お化けの場合に誰を呼ぶべきか知っています。
A_Answers: I know who to call in case of ghosts.
B_Questions: How can we save the Earth from global warming?
C_Questions:
Say in English:
クッパに愛された人はピーチと呼ばれている。
C_Answers: The person who is loved by Bowser (Koopa) is called Peach.
D_Questions:
Say in English:
あなたが先週会った友達に会いたい。
D_Answers: I want to meet the friend that you met last week.
E_Questions:
Say in English:   (海賊 = pirate)
ルフィは海賊王になる男だ。
E_Answers: Luffy is the man/boy who will become king of the pirates.
